extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is using B&R Automation Runtime or B&R mapp View to generate self-signed certificates on production machines.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is B&R Automation Runtime or B&R mapp View used on the system?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Product Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the update to B&R Automation Runtime version 6.1 and B&R mapp View 6.1 to correct the problem.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Defense in Depth Strategy
extracted_playbook.description: Implement B&R's defense in depth strategy for B&R products to minimize security risks in industrial automation and control systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version and secure the connected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
